channel.title: Podcast on Joan Tolos
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on Joan Tolos

item.title: How do I do it?
item.description: From time to time somebody ask me how do I do it meaning, how I manage to do all the things that I do besides the normal activity of work and family. Here the things that I do on my spare time: Read books Write blog posts Play guitar Work on my pet project Exercise So people ask me, how I have the time to do that things. As if somebody can have time.
